title: Reflection
description: Reflection – general partnership development. Indicate how much you agree with each statement about how you show up in relationships, projects, and shared experiences.

questions.text: When things stall, I naturally bring playful energy and momentum back into the mix.
questions.question_text: When things stall, I naturally bring playful energy and momentum back into the mix.

questions.text: Playful challenges or mini-dares tend to re-connect me with partners and shared goals.
questions.question_text: Playful challenges or mini-dares tend to re-connect me with partners and shared goals.

questions.text: I read the room and use levity or small games to shift stuck energy without losing care.
questions.question_text: I read the room and use levity or small games to shift stuck energy without losing care.

questions.text: I feel most alive when we try new places, activities, or approaches together.
questions.question_text: I feel most alive when we try new places, activities, or approaches together.

questions.text: Taking measured risks together often leads to learning and growth for me.
questions.question_text: Taking measured risks together often leads to learning and growth for me.

questions.text: I’m comfortable pivoting plans when a better opportunity appears.
questions.question_text: I’m comfortable pivoting plans when a better opportunity appears.

questions.text: I regularly reflect on my own growth and how it affects the relationship.
questions.question_text: I regularly reflect on my own growth and how it affects the relationship.

questions.text: If communication breaks down, I help restore clarity and trust without escalating conflict.
questions.question_text: If communication breaks down, I help restore clarity and trust without escalating conflict.

questions.text: Before big decisions, I like to name what we want to feel and why it matters.
questions.question_text: Before big decisions, I like to name what we want to feel and why it matters.

questions.text: I balance my appetite for novelty with a steady sense of care and reliability.
questions.question_text: I balance my appetite for novelty with a steady sense of care and reliability.

questions.text: I communicate and maintain my boundaries consistently, even during emotional moments.
questions.question_text: I communicate and maintain my boundaries consistently, even during emotional moments.

questions.text: I track small needs (water, timing, space) that keep everyone resourced over time.
questions.question_text: I track small needs (water, timing, space) that keep everyone resourced over time.

questions.text: The aesthetic quality and attention to detail in shared experiences is deeply fulfilling to me.
questions.question_text: The aesthetic quality and attention to detail in shared experiences is deeply fulfilling to me.

questions.text: I enjoy setting up spaces and tools so everyone can relax into a well-crafted experience.
questions.question_text: I enjoy setting up spaces and tools so everyone can relax into a well-crafted experience.

questions.text: I’d rather do fewer things with more finesse than more things with less polish.
questions.question_text: I’d rather do fewer things with more finesse than more things with less polish.

questions.text: When stakes rise, I’m comfortable stepping into clear leadership to move us forward.
questions.question_text: When stakes rise, I’m comfortable stepping into clear leadership to move us forward.

questions.text: I actively seek feedback and use it to sharpen how I guide or set direction.
questions.question_text: I actively seek feedback and use it to sharpen how I guide or set direction.

questions.text: I can hold a steady course and keep alignment when pressure or ambiguity increases.
questions.question_text: I can hold a steady course and keep alignment when pressure or ambiguity increases.

questions.text: Designing small rituals or intentional frames helps transform ordinary moments into something meaningful.
questions.question_text: Designing small rituals or intentional frames helps transform ordinary moments into something meaningful.

questions.text: I like naming beginnings and endings so we can arrive and land together.
questions.question_text: I like naming beginnings and endings so we can arrive and land together.

questions.text: I can shift headspace with a cue (lighting, scent, phrase) when connection matters.
questions.question_text: I can shift headspace with a cue (lighting, scent, phrase) when connection matters.
